Label.name: $(parent)Label
Label.text: Select your dedicated furniture storage homes

Label.name: $(parent)Label
Label.text: |cffffffDo |cff0000NOT |cffffffselect decorated homes as furnishings will be moved.

Label.name: $(parent)Label
Label.text: Assign furniture categories to storage homes

Label.name: $(parent)Label
Label.text: Drag each furniture category into the home that will store that category of furniture.

Label.name: $(parent)Label
Label.text: Select the furniture styles to store in:

Label.name: $(parent)Message
Label.text:
The furnishings in your |cffff88Storage Homes|cffffff will now be sorted according to your house category assignments. Any |cffff88unassigned categories|cffffff of furniture will be left untouched. Any homes that you did |cff3300not|cffffff select as |cffff88Storage Homes|cffffff will be left untouched.
Items can now be moved to any house with appropriate category assignments, even if you haven't visited it yet. Please do not move your character during the sorting process.
|cffffbbPlease make sure that you have as many inventory slots free as possible; this will expedite the process.|cffffff Your selections are saved automatically so feel free to clear your character's inventory first if necessary.

Label.name: $(parent)Label
Label.text: Your storage homes are now sorted... magically
